text: Carlos Efrén Reyes Rosado (born May 2, 1991), also known by his stage name Farruko, is a retired Puerto Rican singer-songwriter. He became famous after working with Daddy Yankee, J Balvin, Don Omar and J Álvarez. He released his first studio album, El Talento Del Bloque, was released in 2010. Retrieved February 2, 2013. ==Tours== *2010–2011: El Talento Del Bloque Tour *2012: TMPR Tour *2013: El Imperio Nazza Farruko Edition Tour *2015: Los Menores Tour Bus *2016: Visionary World Tour *2017: TrapXFicante Tour *2019: Gangalee Tour === Studio albums === * El Talento del Bloque (2010) * The Most Powerful Rookie (2012) * Farruko Presenta: Los Menores (2014) * Visionary (2015) * TrapXficante (2017) * Gangalee (2019) * En Letra de Otro (2019) * La 167 (2021) * Cvrbon Vrmor (Code : G_d.on) (2024) * Cvrbon Vrmor (2024) ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Puerto Rican singer-songwriters Category:People from Bayamón, Puerto Rico
title: Farruko
